amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate in support of the Advanced Shipbuilding Enterprise of the National Shipbuilding Research Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 700 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 700 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S6836-6837; text: CR S6836) To express the sense of the Senate in support of the Advanced Shipbuilding Enterprise of the National Shipbuilding Research Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 700 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 700 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott.
